footer.aboutUs: For over 20 years, RUSTAR TOURISM has been delivering the fairy tale of the East to people worldwide!
footer.reliablePartner: RUSTAR TOURISM is known as a reliable tourism partner with years of experience and high-quality services.
footer.copyright: © 2024. All rights reserved by Daleel Tourism

DOHA_TOUR.description1: Explore Doha's unique heritage, storied history and modern achievements on a city tour in just 4 hours. We'll stroll through Souq Waqif, Dhow Harbour, visit the Qatar Heritage Village and head to The Pearl Island.
DOHA_TOUR.description2: Our journey begins at Souq Waqif, Doha's oldest market. We'll stroll through a bustling maze of alleys where you'll get to know the city's trading heritage and traditions.
DOHA_TOUR.description3: Our next stop is the Katara Cultural Village. This is the largest and most comprehensive cultural project in Qatar, which is famous for its beautiful theaters and concert halls, and its crown jewel is the Golden Masjid Mosque.
DOHA_TOUR.description4: Next we will have a photo stop at the place where pearls used to be mined. Now “Pearl” is an artificial island with luxurious towers and villas, elite shops, hotels and exquisite restaurants.

bazaar.title: Arab Bazaar
bazaar.description: Souq Waqif is a colorful attraction where you can truly touch the traditions and life of the local population. The local bazaar is filled with the smells of incense and spices, Arabic perfumes and hookah. Here you can see old men fingering their beads on benches, slowly strolling ladies wrapped in black abayas, sedate and well-groomed Arab men sitting in cafes, smoking hookah.

katara.title: Ethnic village 'Katara'
katara.description: The vast territory of the complex includes a magnificent drama theatre and an open amphitheater in the ancient Greek style, a luxurious Opera House, a planetarium, the glittering Golden and Blue Mosques, richly decorated with marvelous mosaics, as well as a multifunctional cinema, a congress hall, galleries and exhibition halls. The village is full of restaurants and cafes with authentic and international cuisine and shops offering to buy works by local artists.

pearl.title: Pearl Island
pearl.description:
"The Pearl of Qatar" - "Arabian Riviera", which consists of: 
Qanat Quartier - a Venice-inspired neighbourhood with colourful buildings, picturesque canals and bridges Porto Arabia - a Mediterranean corner with luxury yachts, restaurants and fashionable residential complexes Medina Centrale is a family-friendly area with gardens, playgrounds, and many cafes and shops

DOHA_TOUR_MUSEUM.header: Doha City Tour with Visit to Qatar National Museum
DOHA_TOUR_MUSEUM.description1: On a sightseeing tour of Doha, in just 4 hours, you will be able to get acquainted with the symbols of the capital of Qatar: from bazaars and camels to yachts and skyscrapers.
DOHA_TOUR_MUSEUM.description2: We will begin our acquaintance with the country's heritage in the ethnic village of "Katara". On its territory there is a modern marble amphitheater, the Blue and Golden Mosques.
DOHA_TOUR_MUSEUM.description3: Then, to immerse yourself in the oriental atmosphere of the city, you will go to the old market Souq Waqif. Here, in addition to the traditional spices of oriental markets, they sell live camels and Arabian horses, which you can even feed.
DOHA_TOUR_MUSEUM.description4: Then, to immerse yourself in the oriental atmosphere of the city, you will go to the old market Souq Waqif. Here, in addition to the traditional spices of oriental markets, they sell live camels and Arabian horses, which you can even feed.
DOHA_TOUR_MUSEUM.description5: We will visit the National Museum of Qatar to witness the country's past and present, and then take a short cruise on a traditional Dhow boat along the coastline.

katara.title: Ethnic village 'Katara'
katara.description: The vast territory of the complex includes a magnificent drama theatre and an open amphitheater in the ancient Greek style, a luxurious Opera House, a planetarium, the glittering Golden and Blue Mosques, richly decorated with marvelous mosaics, as well as a multifunctional cinema, a congress hall, galleries and exhibition halls. The village is full of restaurants and cafes with authentic and international cuisine and shops offering to buy works by local artists.

bazaar.title: Arab Bazaar
bazaar.description: Souq Waqif is a colorful attraction where you can truly touch the traditions and life of the local population. The local bazaar is filled with the smells of incense and spices, Arabic perfumes and hookah. Here you can see old men fingering their beads on benches, slowly strolling ladies wrapped in black abayas, sedate and well-groomed Arab men sitting in cafes, smoking hookah.

pearl.title: Pearl Island
pearl.description:
"The Pearl of Qatar" - "Arabian Riviera", which consists of: 
Qanat Quartier - a Venice-inspired neighbourhood with colourful buildings, picturesque canals and bridges Porto Arabia - a Mediterranean corner with luxury yachts, restaurants and fashionable residential complexes Medina Centrale is a family-friendly area with gardens, playgrounds, and many cafes and shops

National_Museum.title: National Museum of Qatar
National_Museum.description: The National Museum of Qatar looks like a chaotic composition of huge white disks, and is more reminiscent of a space station than an exhibition complex. But it is not only the appearance that is surprising. The story of the past and present of the country with the help of 3D technologies and new inventions is the main feature of the ultra-modern museum.

Arabian_Boat.title: Arabian Boat Cruise
Arabian_Boat.description: Admire stunning views of Doha's skyline with its futuristic skyscrapers as you glide across the sparkling sea on this cruise aboard an Arabian Dhow, a classic traditional wooden vessel.

NORTHWEST_OF_QATAR.header: Excursion to the North-West of Qatar
NORTHWEST_OF_QATAR.description1: We will head to the northwest of the country, where we will discover new, amazing sights of Qatar.
NORTHWEST_OF_QATAR.description2: We will visit the municipal town of Shehaniya, 40 minutes drive from Doha. Camel racing takes place here from November to April, and in the remaining months of the year, camels are prepared and trained for this event.
NORTHWEST_OF_QATAR.description3: We will then discover the unique exhibits of the Sheikh Faisal Museum, who became a collector at the age of 10 and collected countless exhibits from almost 4 continents.
NORTHWEST_OF_QATAR.description4: And in the city of education we will be able to appreciate the unusual design of the mosque, which will leave a new and vivid idea of ​​these temples. The building stands on 5 pillars, which represent the 5 pillars of Islam. The mosque itself can accommodate up to 3,000 believers, and its entire interior is painted white.

camel_racing.title: Camel racing in Shehaniya
camel_racing.description: Camel racing is an ancient sport that is currently actively developing in Qatar as a professional sport. The specially built camel racing track in Al Shehaniya, located 35 kilometers west of Doha, attracts numerous fans to the races every Friday during the winter season. The camels are controlled by unique robot jockeys.

Sheikh_Faisal_Museum.title: Sheikh Faisal Museum
Sheikh_Faisal_Museum.description: This museum gives you the opportunity to enter the Sheikh's opulent mansions and look at his personal belongings. Sheikh Faisal devoted his entire life to collecting beautiful objects. His extensive and remarkable collection includes: carpets, furniture, swords, ancient tapestries, Bedouin clothing and even an entire Syrian house (moved inside the museum).

Student_town.title: Student town
Student_town.description: A real educational hub near Doha is Education City, a city within a city, where the headquarters of the Qatar Foundation is located. And also – campuses, universities, educational centers.

Doha_Mosque.title: Doha Mosque
Doha_Mosque.description: The most unusual mosque in Doha in terms of architecture is a futuristic snow-white building without a single sharp angle. The mosque building is like a spaceship that has landed in the desert and is designed as two intertwined ribbons of minarets that reach into the sky.

MANGROVES_RESERVE.description1: Excursion to the mangrove reserve is a fascinating journey along the salty waters of the bay on kayaks. An evergreen forest, which despite difficult conditions, has become a unique ecosystem. It is in this ecological and interesting place that you can ride enjoying the surrounding wonders of nature. After a short briefing, anyone can set off on a voyage overcoming the simple bends of the water surface between the mangroves.

FISHING_IN_DOHA.description1: Accompanied by an experienced crew, you will set off on a comfortable boat on the waves towards an adventure. Feel like a real fisherman among the sea waves.
FISHING_IN_DOHA.description2: The vessel is equipped with everything necessary for trolling and spinning fishing, and there is a toilet on board.
FISHING_IN_DOHA.description3: And it doesn’t matter whether you are an experienced fisherman or a beginner, real excitement and a great mood will always be with you.

transfer.title: Transfer from and to the hotel

equipment.title: On board there is an echo sounder, GPS, toilet

fishing.title: Fishing equipment – trolling, casting, jigging and bottom fishing

DESERT_SAFARI.description1: Desert safari always brings joy and adrenaline to all participants!
DESERT_SAFARI.description2: Rushing through the dunes, holding your breath on the fast take-offs and steep descents is a real pleasure for those who value active recreation.
DESERT_SAFARI.description3: The uniqueness of a safari in Qatar is that here you can take unique photos against the backdrop of the golden sands of the endless sea of the desert.

jeepRiding.title: Jeep riding
jeepRiding.description: Breathtaking, extreme desert jeep driving will be a wonderful experience and will give you a lot of impressions.

photoStop.title: Photo stop in the desert
photoStop.description: The desert landscapes amaze with their picturesque expanses. We will make a stop at sunset and enjoy the view of the luminary leaning over the horizon.

bayVisit.title: Visiting the Bay
bayVisit.description: This is one of the few places on the planet where the endless desert sands meet the sea - Khor Al-Adaid.

SAFARI_WITH_DINNER.description1: Desert Safari in Qatar is an adventure that fills all participants with strong emotions!
SAFARI_WITH_DINNER.description2: Riding along the dunes, feeling the adrenaline rush from fast take-offs and steep descents is a real pleasure for those who value active recreation.
SAFARI_WITH_DINNER.description3: The special thing about this safari is that it includes a visit to a UNESCO protected and recognized site. This is a rare place on the planet where desert dunes meet the sea - Khor Al Adaid.
SAFARI_WITH_DINNER.description4: You can swim in the sea among the desert sands and end the day with a barbecue dinner in an authentic Bedouin camp, surrounded by thousands of stars.

YACHT_CHARTER_IN_QATAR.description1: Renting a yacht in Qatar is a great opportunity to spend time on the water in luxury and comfort, admire the beauty of the coastline, have a romantic date or relax with family and friends.
YACHT_CHARTER_IN_QATAR.description2: Doha, located right by the water, offers beautiful city panoramas that will open up before you during your walk.
YACHT_CHARTER_IN_QATAR.description3: Dive into the warm sea, bask in the rays of the gentle sun and feel like an exclusive guest on board a snow-white yacht in Doha.

HELICOPTER_FLIGHT.description1: Take to the skies above the capital of Qatar, picturesque Doha, on a 30-minute helicopter tour. Enjoy the views of the city and see its main attractions.
HELICOPTER_FLIGHT.description2: You will admire the cultural village of Katara, spread out on the east coast between the West Bay area and Pearl Island, which stretches 32 km into the azure Persian Gulf, sparkling with the roofs of skyscrapers.
HELICOPTER_FLIGHT.description3: You will see the unique architectural Zigzag Towers, which are the tallest and largest residential zigzag twin towers in the world.
HELICOPTER_FLIGHT.description4: And to finish the tour, you will fly along the coastline and see Lake Alkotafia.

QUEST_THEME_PARK.description1: Quest is a 32,000 sq m indoor theme park located in Msheireb as part of the Doha Oasis mixed-use development. It features thrilling rides including the EpiQ Coaster, the world’s tallest roller coaster, and Magma Blast, the world’s tallest indoor drop tower.
QUEST_THEME_PARK.description2: And those who prefer less extreme entertainment will find simulators with multimedia control and virtual reality attractions in the park.
QUEST_THEME_PARK.description3: Quest is a great place for a family holiday, there are a lot of miniature attractions for young guests and family holidays.
QUEST_THEME_PARK.description4: In this kingdom of wonders everyone will find something fascinating and interesting for themselves.

MERYAL_AQUAPARK.description1: Experience a world of adventure at Meryal Water Park. Qatar's largest water park features 45 thrilling rides and 52 incredible water slides. Only Meryal is home to the world's tallest slide, the Icon Tower.
MERYAL_AQUAPARK.description2: The park is located on the coast, which allows everyone to relax on the sandy beach. Here you can also have a snack in any of the many restaurants and cafes.

jeepRiding.title: Jeep riding
jeepRiding.description: Breathtaking, extreme desert jeep driving will be a wonderful experience and will give you a lot of impressions.

photoStop.title: Photo stop in the desert
photoStop.description: The desert landscapes amaze with their picturesque expanses. We will make a stop at sunset and enjoy the view of the sun setting over the sea horizon.

swimming.title: Swimming in the sea
swimming.description: Dive into the amazing waters of the unique Khor Al Adaid – where the sea meets the desert.

bbqDinner.title: BBQ Dinner
bbqDinner.description: Enjoy an open-air desert dinner at a Bedouin camp.

kataraHeritageVillage.title: Katara Heritage Village
kataraHeritageVillage.description: The Cultural Village is an amazing initiative of hope for people's participation through art and cultural exchange, made possible by His Highness Sheikh Hamad bin Khalifa Al Thani, the Father Emir of the State of Qatar.

pearlIsland.title: Island 'Pearl'
pearlIsland.description: The Pearl Qatar is a modern district located on an artificial island. It is the largest construction project initiated by Sheikh Abdullah bin Khalifa Al Tan.

zigzagTowers.title: Zigzag Towers
zigzagTowers.description: Situated on the best stretch of the waterfront between Lusail and Pearl, the twin towers of West Bay Lagoon Plaza, or the Dancing Towers, have become one of the country's symbols thanks to their unusual architecture.

questsAndGames.title: Quests and Games
description: Games for the whole family with prizes

3DAttractions.title: 3D Attractions
description: Attraction 'The Legend of the Golden Oryx'

MANGROVES_RESERVE.6: This is the habitat of flamingos. We will see them if we are lucky.

SAFARI_WITH_DINNER.5: Camp on the seashore in the desert

MERYAL_AQUAPARK.1: Water Slides for the Whole Family
MERYAL_AQUAPARK.4: The Huge Territory of Meryal Water Park

why_us.title: Why with us
reasons: Legal entity with 24 years of experience

DOHA_TOUR.q: How to dress properly for an excursion?
DOHA_TOUR.a: The dress code is strict: knees and shoulders must be covered with opaque clothing for both women and men.

DOHA_TOUR.q: Conditions for visiting an excursion with children
DOHA_TOUR.a:
Children under 3 years old are free (without a seat on the bus on a group excursion).
Children 3-11 years old – child ticket.
From 12 years old – adult ticket.

DOHA_TOUR.q: Do I need to bring drinking water with me?
DOHA_TOUR.a: One bottle of water per person will be provided in the bus. If you need more, you can take water with you.

DOHA_TOUR.q: Will they take us back to the hotel?
DOHA_TOUR.a: Yes, the transfer is both ways.

DOHA_TOUR_MUSEUM.q: How to dress properly for an excursion?
DOHA_TOUR_MUSEUM.a: The dress code is strict: knees and shoulders must be covered with opaque clothing for both women and men.

DOHA_TOUR_MUSEUM.q: Conditions for visiting an excursion with children
DOHA_TOUR_MUSEUM.a:
Children under 3 years old are free (without a seat on the bus on a group excursion).
Children 3-11 years old – child ticket.
From 12 years old – adult ticket.

DOHA_TOUR_MUSEUM.q: Do I need to bring drinking water with me?
DOHA_TOUR_MUSEUM.a: One bottle of water per person will be provided in the bus. If you need more, you can take water with you.

DOHA_TOUR_MUSEUM.q: Will they take us back to the hotel?
DOHA_TOUR_MUSEUM.a: Yes, the transfer is both ways.

NORTHWEST_OF_QATAR.q: How to dress properly for an excursion?
NORTHWEST_OF_QATAR.a:
Smart casual dress code (closed – for visiting museums, palaces and mosques).
Clothing must be long (to the ankles and wrists), not transparent and without slits.
Women must cover their heads with a headscarf when visiting a mosque.
Tattoos must also be covered with clothing.
You should bring warm clothes with you; the bus is air-conditioned.

NORTHWEST_OF_QATAR.q: Conditions for visiting an excursion with children
NORTHWEST_OF_QATAR.a:
The excursion is conducted on an individual basis.
Ticket surcharges apply only to guests aged 12 years and over.
Children under 12 do not need to pay for tickets - admission is free
Duration of the excursion is half a day

NORTHWEST_OF_QATAR.q: Will they take us back to the hotel?
NORTHWEST_OF_QATAR.a: Yes, the transfer is both ways.

MANGROVES_RESERVE.a: Dress code: comfortable, sporty, closed. We recommend taking hats, sunglasses and sunscreen with you.

MANGROVES_RESERVE.q: Can I take water and food with me?
MANGROVES_RESERVE.a: Water will be provided on the bus at 0.5 ml per person, and water and food will be provided during lunch.

MANGROVES_RESERVE.q: Conditions for visiting an excursion with children
MANGROVES_RESERVE.a:
Children under 6 years of age are not allowed on the tour.
Children 6 years and older are allowed to attend the excursion.

MANGROVES_RESERVE.q: How long does the tour last?
MANGROVES_RESERVE.a: The tour will take approximately 4 hours.

FISHING_IN_DOHA.a:
The dress code is sportswear and beachwear.
You must bring swimming accessories, towels, a hat, sunglasses and cream.

FISHING_IN_DOHA.q: What documents do you need to take with you?
FISHING_IN_DOHA.a: You must have your original passport with you to pass inspection at the port of departure.

FISHING_IN_DOHA.q: Can I take water and food with me?
FISHING_IN_DOHA.a: There will be water on board, but you are welcome to bring extra drinks and snacks. The boat is equipped with a portable refrigerator.

In case of adverse weather conditions, we will notify you as quickly as possible.
The fishing trip will be rescheduled to another date or the excursion fee will be refunded.

DESERT_SAFARI.q: Will it be possible to take a ride behind the wheel of a jeep?
DESERT_SAFARI.a: For safety reasons, guests are not allowed to drive a jeep during the safari. You will be served by a professional driver.

DESERT_SAFARI.q: Is it possible to choose the seat in the car?
What is the best way to dress for a safari?
DESERT_SAFARI.a: Dress code: sportswear, comfortable. Due to the possible decrease in air temperature in the desert at night, we recommend having warm clothes with you.

DESERT_SAFARI.q: Is it possible to go on a jeep safari with children?
DESERT_SAFARI.a:
Yes, however extreme riding is not recommended for children under 6 years of age.
Children 12 years and under must be accompanied by an adult.

DESERT_SAFARI.q: Will they take us back to the hotel?
DESERT_SAFARI.a: Yes, the transfer is both ways.

SAFARI_WITH_DINNER.q: Will it be possible to take a ride behind the wheel of a jeep?
SAFARI_WITH_DINNER.a: For safety reasons, guests are not allowed to drive a jeep during the safari. You will be served by a professional driver.

SAFARI_WITH_DINNER.q: Is it possible to choose the seat in the car?
What is the best way to dress for a safari?
SAFARI_WITH_DINNER.a:
Dress code: sportswear, comfortable. Due to the possible decrease in air temperature in the desert at night, we recommend having warm clothes with you.
When booking an 8-hour tour, please bring your swimming gear.

SAFARI_WITH_DINNER.q: Is it possible to go on a jeep safari with children?
SAFARI_WITH_DINNER.a:
Yes, however extreme riding is not recommended for children under 6 years of age.
Children 12 years and under must be accompanied by an adult.

SAFARI_WITH_DINNER.q: Will they take us back to the hotel?
SAFARI_WITH_DINNER.a: Yes, the transfer is both ways.

SAFARI_WITH_DINNER.q: Changes in Ramadan and Religious Holidays
SAFARI_WITH_DINNER.a:
The entertainment program may be subject to change or cancellation.
Serving alcoholic beverages may be prohibited.
The same may also apply to cases of national mourning.

YACHT_CHARTER_IN_QATAR.q: Why take your passports with you?
YACHT_CHARTER_IN_QATAR.a: The Coast Guard requires all passengers to show their passports when the ship leaves the port at sea, otherwise the cruise may not take place.
Dress code: beach, comfortable. You must have swimming accessories with you.

YACHT_CHARTER_IN_QATAR.q: Is it possible to go on a boat trip with children?
YACHT_CHARTER_IN_QATAR.a: Yes, children aged 6-7 years can already enjoy a boat trip

YACHT_CHARTER_IN_QATAR.q: Is it possible to sail a yacht yourself?
YACHT_CHARTER_IN_QATAR.a: No. In Doha, you need a local license to operate a boat or yacht.

HELICOPTER_FLIGHT.a: Smart casual, comfortable attire. Hats and scarves are not allowed on board.

HELICOPTER_FLIGHT.q: What documents do you need to take with you?
HELICOPTER_FLIGHT.a: You must have the original passport with a valid tourist visa and printed copies of them.

The helicopter can accommodate up to 4 people.
Before the flight, you must go through registration, weighing and instructions.
It is prohibited to use flash photography when taking photographs in flight.
Persons with reduced mobility must be accompanied by an adult who pays for the flight and is fully responsible for boarding and disembarking from the helicopter.

HELICOPTER_FLIGHT.q: Why do I need to provide my weight when booking?
HELICOPTER_FLIGHT.a: Reporting weight is necessary to ensure safe and correct weight distribution in the helicopter.
Seating in the helicopter is based on the weight of each passenger. It is not possible to reserve a specific seat, and changing seats is prohibited.

HELICOPTER_FLIGHT.q: What can you take with you on a flight?
HELICOPTER_FLIGHT.a:
It is permitted to carry and use smartphones, amateur video and photo cameras during the flight.
It is prohibited to use professional cameras (with a lens of 400 mm or more), selfie sticks and tablets.
It is prohibited to bring water and food on board the helicopter.
The administration reserves the right to prohibit the carriage on board of items that are considered dangerous or cause inconvenience to other passengers during the flight.
Lockers are provided to store your belongings during the flight.

Children of any age are allowed to fly.
Pregnant women are allowed to fly up to 32 weeks.

In case of unfavorable weather conditions (visibility less than 5000 m), we will notify you as quickly as possible.
The flight will be rescheduled to another date or the amount for the excursion will be refunded.

QUEST_THEME_PARK.a:
Dress code: smart casual (closed).
You should bring warm clothes with you; the bus is air-conditioned.
Duration of the excursion is half a day (5 hours in the park if you choose the option with transfer)

QUEST_THEME_PARK.q: Conditions for visiting an excursion with children
QUEST_THEME_PARK.a:
Children under 4 years old are free (without a seat on the bus on a group excursion).
Children 4-11 years old – child ticket.
From 12 years old – adult ticket.

MERYAL_AQUAPARK.a:
Dress code: comfortable (closed). Bring swimsuits and towels.
Swimsuits must be made of opaque fabric and cover the body well. Revealing swimsuits, swimsuits with buckles, zippers, rivets or any metal decorations are not allowed.
The administration reserves the right to refuse any visitor in an inappropriate swimsuit.

MERYAL_AQUAPARK.q: Conditions for visiting the water park with children
MERYAL_AQUAPARK.a:
Children under 3 years old are served free of charge3-11 years old – at the price of a child ticket
12 years and older - adult ticket price

points.hotel: The most convenient way to make a reservation is to write to your hotel guide. If you do not have his contact, write to the support service.
